hero.headline: Brooklyn's Finest Caviar, Shipped Fresh Nationwide

hero.headline: Brooklyn's Finest Caviar, Shipped Fresh Nationwide
hero.subheadline: Hand-selected by Chef Peter Shelsky from sustainable farms worldwide. The same quality served at New York's finest restaurants, delivered to your table.
hero.image_alt: Premium Golden Ossetra Caviar from Shelsky's of Brooklyn

press_quote.text: Shelsky's of Brooklyn is redefining the traditional appetizing experience with obsessive attention to quality and authenticity.

products.name: Ossetra Caviar
products.description: Rich, nutty flavor with firm texture and golden-amber pearls. Our signature selection.
products.tasting_notes: Buttery, nutty, with hints of brine and a clean finish

products.name: Kaluga Caviar
products.description: Firmer eggs with lovely mild flavor. Farmed sustainably in the Amur River Basin.

products.name: Siberian Sturgeon Caviar
products.description: Reminiscent of classic Sevruga. Soft, briny, and mineral-forward from Polish farms.

products.name: Imperial Ossetra Caviar
products.description: The crown jewel. Large, golden pearls with extraordinary depth and complexity.
products.tasting_notes: Complex, creamy, profound umami with lingering finish

why_different.headline: Why Shelsky's Caviar Is Different
why_different.intro: Before Brooklyn had artisanal everything, Jewish appetizing shops were the original caviar dealers. We're just bringing it back home.
points: Direct relationships with sustainable farms worldwide
Each batch personally tasted and selected by Chef Shelsky
The same obsessive care we put into our 3-day fermented bagels
Mother-of-pearl serving spoons included with orders over $200

chef_story.headline: Meet Chef Peter Shelsky
chef_story.subtitle: Trained at Three-Michelin-Star Eleven Madison Park
chef_story.content: For over 13 years, Chef Peter Shelsky has been Brooklyn's destination for exceptional appetizing. His caviar program reflects the same obsessive attention to quality that drives his 3-day fermented bagels and house-cured gravlax. Peter personally selects each caviar from sustainable farms he's partnered with for years.

testimonials.quote: On Sept 6th I did an overnight order and spent over $300. Everything was excellent including the packaging. Shelsky's brings back amazing memories of NYC!
Please do yourself a favor and order from Shelsky's. It's the most incredible quality. Quintessential NYC!
Shelsky's catered our family event. The food was top quality and beautifully arranged. Delivered on time.

how_it_works.headline: How to Serve Your Caviar Like a Pro

steps.title: Chill Properly
steps.description: Keep refrigerated at 28-32°F until 15 minutes before serving.

steps.title: Use the Right Tools
steps.description: Always use mother-of-pearl or bone spoons (included with orders over $200).

steps.title: Present on Ice
steps.description: Serve in the original tin, nestled in crushed ice.

steps.title: Perfect Pairings
steps.description: Serve with blinis, creme fraiche, and champagne. Or on a fresh Shelsky's bagel.

faq.question: How is the caviar shipped?
faq.answer: All caviar ships overnight in temperature-controlled insulated packaging with gel ice packs. We include tracking so you know exactly when to expect delivery.

faq.question: How long does caviar stay fresh?
faq.answer: Unopened caviar keeps 4-6 weeks refrigerated. Once opened, consume within 3 days for best quality. Store at 28-32°F in the coldest part of your refrigerator.

faq.question: What's included with my order?
faq.answer: Orders over $200 include complimentary mother-of-pearl serving spoons. All orders include detailed tasting notes, serving suggestions, and storage instructions.

faq.question: Do you offer a satisfaction guarantee?
faq.answer: Absolutely. If you're not completely delighted with your caviar, contact us and we'll make it right. Your satisfaction is guaranteed.

faq.question: Can I send caviar as a gift?
faq.answer: Yes! Add a gift message at checkout. We include a personalized note and can omit pricing from the packaging. Perfect for celebrations and corporate gifting.

guarantee.title: 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed
guarantee.text: If you're not completely delighted with your caviar, contact us. We'll work with you to make it right—no questions asked.

final_cta.headline: Ready to Experience Brooklyn's Finest Caviar?
final_cta.subheadline: Free shipping on orders over $300. Overnight delivery in temperature-controlled packaging.
